q: why does someone in the video pull the rope before pruning branches
pred: In the video, someone is seen pulling the rope before pruning the branches. This action is likely to help the person maintain a safe distance from the branches while pruning them. By pulling the rope, the person can ensure that the branches do not come into contact with their body, reducing the risk of injury from the branches. Additionally, the person might be using the rope to help guide the branches into the desired position for pruning.
